Files for Humans


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://easy-file.readthedocs.io.


Features
--------

* based on `pathlib.Path`
* UTF-8 by default
* fast JSON serialization/deserialization with orjson_
* YAML serialization/deserialization 

Install
-------

* pip Install easy-file
